cast.overview: The lively João Grilo and the sly Chicó are poor guys living in the hinterland who cheat a bunch of people in a small town in Northeastern Brazil. When they die, they have to be judged by Christ, the Devil and the Virgin Mary before they are admitted to paradise.
cast.title: A Dog's Will

details.biography: Marco Antônio Barroso Nanini (Recife, May 31, 1948) is a Brazilian actor, author, theater producer and playwright. With a prominent career in theater, cinema and television, he received several awards throughout his career, including six Prêmios Qualidade Brasil, two Prêmios Sharp and two Prêmios APCA, in addition to two Troféus Imprensa nominations and a Prêmio Shell.
details.name: Marco Nanini
